title: Current Events Quiz #2 (With Answers)
stimulus: The Lucas Sielaff and Lennon Tyler Case

questions.title: Q001 Why were Lucas Sielaff and Lennon Tyler detained at the US-Mexico border?
questions.prompt: Why were Lucas Sielaff and Lennon Tyler detained at the US-Mexico border?

choices.content: For stating they were going to Las Vegas during questioning

feedback.correct: Correct! They were detained after stating they planned to visit Las Vegas.
feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. They were detained after stating they planned to visit Las Vegas.

questions.title: Q002 What happened to US citizen Dr. Lennon Tyler during their border detention?
questions.prompt: What happened to US citizen Dr. Lennon Tyler during their border detention?

choices.content: She was handcuffed and chained to a bench
She was asked to translate for Lucas

feedback.correct: Correct! Despite being a US citizen, she was handcuffed and chained to a bench.
feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Dr. Tyler was handcuffed and chained to a bench despite being a US citizen.

questions.title: Q003 How was their dog–who had recently had surgery in Mexico–treated?
questions.prompt: How was their dog–who had recently had surgery in Mexico–treated?

choices.content: The dog was left in the car for at least four hours
The dog was petted and fed by authorities
The dog was put in a cage and staff had pet food delivered

feedback.correct: Correct! The dog was left in their car for at least four hours despite having recently had surgery.
feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. The dog was left in their car for at least four hours despite having recently had surgery.

questions.title: Q004 How far into Lucas Sielaff's permitted 90-day stay was he when detained?
questions.prompt: How far into Lucas Sielaff's permitted 90-day stay was he when detained?

feedback.correct: Correct! Lucas was only 22 days into his legal 90-day permit when he was detained.
feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Lucas was 22 days into his legal 90-day permit, not at the beginning or over his allowed time.

questions.title: Q005 How did US authorities handle Lennon Tyler's requests for information about her fiancé during his 16-day detention?
questions.prompt: How did US authorities handle Lennon Tyler's requests for information about her fiancé during his 16-day detention?

choices.content: Gave her no information about his whereabouts

feedback.correct: Correct! Authorities provided no information to Lennon about Lucas's whereabouts during his detention.
feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Authorities gave Lennon no information about Lucas's whereabouts during his detention.

questions.title: Q006 What financial burden did this incident place on the couple?
questions.prompt: What financial burden did this incident place on the couple?

choices.content: None, the US government covered all expenses
They had to pay for a $2,744 flight for Lucas to return to Germany

feedback.correct: Correct! They had to pay $2,744 for Lucas's flight back to Germany.
feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. The couple had to pay $2,744 for Lucas's flight back to Germany.

questions.title: Q007 What longer-term impact did this experience have on Lucas?
questions.prompt: What longer-term impact did this experience have on Lucas?

feedback.correct: Correct! Lucas experienced nightmares and psychological trauma that required therapy.
feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Lucas suffered from nightmares and psychological trauma that required therapy.

questions.title: Q008 What has this incident and others like it caused several countries to do?
questions.prompt: What has this incident and others like it caused several countries to do?

choices.content: Update their travel advisories for citizens visiting the US

feedback.correct: Correct! Several countries have updated their travel advisories for citizens visiting the US.
feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Several countries have updated their travel advisories for citizens visiting the US.

questions.title: Q009 What rights was Lucas denied during his detention?
questions.prompt: What rights was Lucas denied during his detention?

choices.content: Denied a lawyer, denied access to a translator and clear explanations of allegations

feedback.correct: Correct! Lucas was denied access to a lawyer, translator, and clear explanations of allegations.
feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Lucas was denied access to a lawyer, translator, and clear explanations of allegations.

questions.title: Q010 How has this experience affected the couple's future plans?
questions.prompt: How has this experience affected the couple's future plans?

choices.content: They are reconsidering their wedding location and view of the US

feedback.correct: Correct! They are reconsidering their wedding location and their view of the US.
feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. They are reconsidering their wedding location and their view of the US.
